categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi actors

nodes.text: Paul Brooke (born on 22 November 1944 in London, England) is a British actor.

Brooke played Malakili, the Rancor Keeper, in Star Wars Episode VI: Return of the Jedi, although the character's voice was dubbed by Ernie Fosselius. He played British Conservative politician Ian Gow in the 2004 BBC series The Alan Clark Diaries. In 2006, he guest starred in the Doctor Who audio adventure "Year of the Pig" as well as the Mr. Bean episode "The Library". Brooke has also appeared in television series such as Lovejoy, Rab C. Nesbitt, Kavanagh QC, Sharpe, Midsomer Murders, Hustle and My Family.
